description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to vary condition 2 (Approved Drawings) to alter windows and doors, condition 3 (Materials)) to alter the wording, condition 7 (Drainage) to refer to the updated drainage strategy and condition 8 (Contamination) to update the report of planning permission Ref: 23/00900/FUL for the application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to vary conditions 2 (Approved Drawings), 3 (Materials), 4 (Cycle), 5 (Waste), 6 (Landscaping), 7 (Drainage) and 8 (Contamination) for minor changes to the layout and building that will amend approved drainage, contamination and landscaping details of planning permission Ref: 22/01256/FUL for the redevelopment of the site and erection of 4 units comprising 3 x 2 bed and 1 x 3 bed detached dwellings with associated parking and gardens. Removal of external storage (re-submission following previous ref. 21/00633/FUL).
